content: join my facebook group for community coupons and cal challenges take me to the group 1 yarn use both strands together lion brand 24/7 cotton medium weight #4 yarn 100% mercerized cotton 186 yds/170 m per 3 5 oz/100 g skein camel 1 skein cascade yarns hampton dk / light weight #3 yarn 170% pima cotton + 30% linen 273 yds/250 m per 3 5 oz/100 g skein sesame 1 hank materials us h/8 5 mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle stitch key chain s = chain s single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitch es specialty stitches & techniques continuous rounds size 18 20 22 24 around x 8 8 5 9 9 5 tall gauge 13 sts = 4 14 rounds = 4 notes pattern is worked with both strands of yarn together pattern worked in continuous rounds from the top down use a stitch marker to mark the top of the first stitch in each round move as each round is complete stitch diagram for first 6 rounds is on last page 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
